resources.string:
Aaruush the annual techno management festival of SRM University, Chennai India. The word 'Aaruush' means in crude terms, 'The first rays of the sun'.

This technical-fest consists of various science and technology and management based competetions, symposia, events, guest lectures, video conferences, exhibitions, demonstrations and workshops

It's rather customary held over four days and four nights during the odd semester at SRM.
